docs.lead_paragraph: The baby is a mongoloid born with duodenal atresia, an intestinal obstruction. The parents, professional people in Maryland, refuse permission for the surgery that will enable the infant to survive, deciding that it would be unfair to their two normal children to bring a mongoloid into the home.
docs.abstract: E Freeman article on ethics surrounding birth of child with meningomyelocele, severe deformity also known as 'open spine,' that poses life or death issues for both parents and drs; drs comment; drawing
